Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.stellar.sdk.AllowTrustOperation
    As of release 0.24.0, replaced by SetTrustlineFlagsOperation Represents AllowTrust operation.
    org.stellar.sdk.responses.operations.AllowTrustOperationResponse
    As of release 0.24.0, replaced by SetTrustLineFlagsOperationResponse Represents AllowTrust operation response.
    org.stellar.sdk.responses.effects.TrustlineAuthorizedEffectResponse
    As of release 0.24.0, replaced by TrustlineFlagsUpdatedEffectResponse Represents trustline_authorized effect response.
    org.stellar.sdk.responses.effects.TrustlineAuthorizedToMaintainLiabilitiesEffectResponse
    As of release 0.24.0, replaced by TrustlineFlagsUpdatedEffectResponse Represents trustline_authorized_to_maintain_liabilities effect response.
    org.stellar.sdk.responses.effects.TrustlineDeauthorizedEffectResponse
    As of release 0.24.0, replaced by TrustlineFlagsUpdatedEffectResponse Represents trustline_deauthorized effect response.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.stellar.sdk.requests.OffersRequestBuilder.forAccount(String)
    Use OffersRequestBuilder.forSeller(java.lang.String) Builds request to GET /accounts/{account}/offers
    org.stellar.sdk.responses.AccountResponse.Signer.getAccountId()
    Use AccountResponse.Signer.getKey()
    org.stellar.sdk.responses.RootResponse.getProtocolVersion()
    Will be removed in Horizon 0.17.0
    org.stellar.sdk.responses.operations.SetOptionsOperationResponse.getSigner()
    Use SetOptionsOperationResponse.getSignerKey()
    org.stellar.sdk.responses.LedgerResponse.getTransactionCount()
    Will be removed in Horizon 0.17.0
